Changelog.Name: Put all JSON files into /data
Changelog.Description: I put all the JSOn files into central /data folder, except for api.json, data.json and sitemap.json.

Changelog.Name: Standardized API interface and data models
Changelog.Description: I sstandardized the API endpoints and data models somewhat and stopped programmtically generating them for a while, until I stabilize the approach.

Changelog.Name: Setting up the Github Repository
Changelog.Description: I setup a Github repository that is being used to host this entire developer portal.

Changelog.Name: Created Github Page for Repository
Changelog.Description: Using the Github repository I configured a Github Page to be the public face of this developer area.

Changelog.Name: Downloaded and Published Default Jekyll Site
Changelog.Description: I downloaded the base Jekyll Site template to overwrite the default Github pages template

Changelog.Name: Integrated Twitter Bootstrap
Changelog.Description: I downloaded Twitter Bootstrap template and integrated with the default Jekyll site template to give a fuller set of UI features and make the template to 508 compliant.

Changelog.Name: Created VA Facility API
Changelog.Description: I created a REST VA facility from the data currently available in the VA location web service. The API was not complete and problematic for developing a facade, so I just recreated.

Changelog.Name: Created VA PTSD API
Changelog.Description: I created a REST VA PTSD program locator from the data currently available in the VA PTSD web service. The API was not complete and problematic for developing a facade, so I just recreated.

Changelog.Name: Created VA Substance Abuse API
Changelog.Description: I created a REST VA substance abuse program locator from the data currently available on the site form locator. There is no API for this data currently, but it is publicly available.

Changelog.Name: Created VA Press API
Changelog.Description: I created a REST VA press release API from the data currently available on the web site. There is no API for this data currently, but it is publicly available.
